chargeHist.descr: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
The defendant Brian J Hoffman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Brian J Hoffman in court with attorney Kirk A. Redetzke.  Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 2 and 3.   Penalty enhancer struck on Cts. 2 and 3 by Court upon motion of the State.  Court finds defendant guilty. Ct. 1 dismissed and read-in. 

Court orders the following: 
Ct. 2:
- 30 days jail straight time consecutive STAYED for 2 years Probation - concurrent
- Court Costs of $243.00 - apply bail 
- Conditions of  Probation: Maintain absolute sobriety - no alcohol/drugs.  Submit to a formal AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment/counseling. Follow directions of all medications taking. No other medications unless prescribed by a Doctor and in the amount prescribed.  Follow thru with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent.  DNA surcharge is waived.

Ct. 3:
- 30 days jail straight time consecutive STAYED for 2 years Probation - concurrent
- Court Costs of $243.00 - apply balance of bail to costs and file 14CM880 
- Conditions of  Probation: Maintain absolute sobriety - no alcohol/drugs.  Submit to a formal AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment/counseling. Follow directions of all medications taking. No other medications unless prescribed by a Doctor and in the amount prescribed.  Follow thru with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent.  DNA surcharge is waived.
